titleStmt.title: Unto His Majesties High Commissioner, His Grace, and the Honourable Estates of Parliament. John Calander of Craigeforth.
titleStmt.author: Callander, John, d. 1711.

notesStmt.note: Petition that John Callander might be allowed to have recourse to the Lords of the Treasury for payment of money due to him, in spite of information given against him by Alexander Higgins of Craigforth.
Imperfect: creased with some loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
